doc:
Kevin Sussman https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kevin_Sussman 0 Kevin Sussman (born December 4, 1970) is an American actor and comedian. He is known for playing Walter on the ABC comedy-drama Ugly Betty and Stuart Bloom on the CBS sitcom The Big Bang Theory. Starting with the sixth season of The Big Bang Theory, he was promoted to a series regular. Kevin_Sussman ( born December_4_,_1970 ) is an_American_actor_and_comedian . He is_known for playing Walter on the_ABC_comedy-drama_Ugly_Betty and Stuart_Bloom on the_CBS_sitcom The_Big_Bang_Theory . Starting with the_sixth_season of The_Big_Bang_Theory , he was_promoted to a_series_regular .
